public class UIChartValueFormat
extends org.apache.myfaces.trinidad.component.UIXComponentBase

Defines formatting properties for the values of a chart.

getType

public final java.lang.String getType()
Returns the type of the chart value format. Identifies which value this tag applies to. Valid values are: "x", "y", "y2", "z", "value", and "label".

setType

public final void setType(java.lang.String type)
Specifies the type of the chart value format. Valid values are: "x", "y", "y2", "z", "value", and "label".

getConverter

public final javax.faces.convert.Converter getConverter()
Returns the converter for the component. Only support javax.faces.convert.NumberConverter

setConverter

public final void setConverter(javax.faces.convert.Converter converter)
Specifies the converter for the component. Only support javax.faces.convert.NumberConverter

getScaling

public final java.lang.String getScaling()
Returns the scale factor of the value. Valid values are: auto (default), none, thousand, million, billion, trillion, quadrillion.

setScaling

public final void setScaling(java.lang.String scaling)
Specifies the scale factor of the value. Valid values are: auto (default), none, thousand, million, billion, trillion, quadrillion.
